org.apache.reef.driver.context

Interface ContextBase

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Identifiable
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    ActiveContext, ClosedContext, FailedContext
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ClosedContextBridge, ClosedContextImpl, EvaluatorContext, FailedContextBridge, FailedContextImpl

    public interface ContextBase
extends Identifiable
    A common base interface for all Driver-side representations of Contexts.

        String getEvaluatorId()

        Optional<String> getParentId()
        Returns:
        the ID of the parent context, if there is one.
